title: Dauin Macro Diving Expedition
description: A 5-day diving trip to the hidden gem of Dauin, Philippines. Explore the unique volcanic ash seabed, a paradise for macro photography, and search for rare marine life like the incredible 'solar-powered' Sheep Nudibranch (Costasiella kuroshimae).

entries.title: Arrival and Exploration of Dauin
entries.description: Arrive in Dauin, a coastal municipality known for its volcanic black sand beaches. Settle in and take some time to explore the laid-back coastal town.

entries.title: Macro Diving Session: The Hunt for Sheep Nudibranch
entries.description: A guided morning dive focusing on Dauin's famous muck diving sites. The main objective is to spot and photograph the tiny, 'solar-powered' Sheep Nudibranch on the volcanic sand seabed, a true macro paradise.
entries.address: Dauin Marine Sanctuaries, Dauin, Negros Oriental, Philippines

entries.title: Afternoon Dive and Underwater Photography
entries.description: A second dive to explore the rich biodiversity of the area. Practice macro photography skills to capture the intricate details of the various strange and wonderful sea creatures.
entries.address: Dauin Marine Sanctuaries, Dauin, Negros Oriental, Philippines

entries.title: Discovering More Marine Wonders
entries.description: Another full day dedicated to diving. With a local guide, explore different dive spots known for unique critters. The clear water quality enhances the experience of observing the diverse marine life.
entries.address: Dauin Marine Sanctuaries, Dauin, Negros Oriental, Philippines

entries.title: Relax and Enjoy the Local Vibe
entries.description: Spend the day relaxing on the beach, interacting with the local community, and enjoying the tranquil atmosphere of Dauin as seen in the video.

entries.title: Departure
entries.description: Final morning in Dauin. Enjoy a local breakfast before departing.
